sen2r: Find, Download and Process Sentinel-2 Data 1.1.0
  • Home
  • Function reference

Load Sentinel-2 tiles

Source: R/s2_tiles.R
s2_tiles.Rd

Load the vector object of the Sentinel-2 tiles.

s2_tiles()

Value

An sf spatial object containing the extent of the tiles.

Note

License: GPL 3.0

Examples

# Retrieve all the tiles
s2tiles <- s2_tiles()

# Extract a subset of all the tiles
httr::GET(
  "https://biogeo.ucdavis.edu/data/gadm3.6/Rsf/gadm36_ITA_0_sf.rds",
  httr::write_disk(it_path <- tempfile())
)
#> Response [https://data.biogeo.ucdavis.edu/data/gadm3.6/Rsf/gadm36_ITA_0_sf.rds]
#>   Date: 2019-09-24 14:48
#>   Status: 200
#>   Content-Type: <unknown>
#>   Size: 975 kB
#> <ON DISK>  /tmp/RtmpZWdi9d/filef2485fb14af5
it <- readRDS(it_path)
s2tiles_it <- s2tiles[suppressMessages(sf::st_intersects(it, s2tiles))[[1]],]
s2_coords <- sf::st_coordinates(suppressWarnings(sf::st_centroid(s2tiles_it)))

# Show the tiles
plot(s2tiles_it$geometry, border = "blue")
plot(it$geometry, border = "red", add = TRUE)
text(s2_coords[,1], s2_coords[,2], s2tiles_it$tile_id, col = "blue", cex = 0.5)
